Trigger.Name: Final Decree Nisi
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:[0-9A-F]{8}:(?<name>[a-zA-Z' -]+) gains the effect of Final Decree Nisi (?<nType>.*) from for (?<duration>\d+)

Trigger.Name: Final Judgment: Decree Nisi
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:[0-9A-F]{8}:(?<name>[a-zA-Z' -]+) gains the effect of Final Judgment: Decree Nisi (?<nType>.*) from for

Action.VariableExpression: 1: North, In front, Stop at 3rd explosion
1: Same Side, Resolve in void, soak 3rd
2: Far Side, Resolve in void, soak 3rd
3: South, In front, Stop at 4th explosion
3: Stay, Bait Cone, South Limit Cut, Dodge Sacrament
4: Far, Bait Jump, North Limit Cut, Dodge Sacrament
5: North, In front, Stop at 7th explosion
5: Same Side, Soak 1st, Limit Cut South of Puddle
6: Far Side, Soak 1st, Limit Cut South of Puddle
7: South, In front, Stop at 9th explosion
7: Same Side, Soak 2nd, Limit Cut South of Puddle
8: Far Side, Soak 2nd, Limit Cut South of Puddle

Trigger.Name: Contact Prohibiton
Trigger.RegularExpression: You suffer the effect of Final Word: Contact Prohibiton.

Trigger.Name: Contact Regulation
Trigger.RegularExpression: You suffer the effect of Final Word: Contact Regulation.

Trigger.Name: Escape Prohibiton
Trigger.RegularExpression: You suffer the effect of Final Word: Escape Prohibiton.

Trigger.Name: Escape Detection
Trigger.RegularExpression: You suffer the effect of Final Word: Escape Detection

Trigger.Name: Shared Sentence
Trigger.RegularExpression: You suffer the effect of Shared Sentence.

Action.UseTTSTextExpression: Go right go right shared sentence

Trigger.Name: Aggravated Assault
Trigger.RegularExpression: You suffer the effect of Aggravated Assault.

Trigger.Name: Celestial Opposition (Nocturnal)
Trigger.RegularExpression: You gain the effect of Nocturnal Opposition

Trigger.Name: Celestial Opposition (Diurnal)
Trigger.RegularExpression: You gain the effect of Diurnal Opposition

Trigger.Name: Stright Shot
Trigger.RegularExpression: You gain the effect of .*Straight Shot Ready

Trigger.Name: Removes used waymarks after Sacrament/Radiant Sacrament is done
Equipment Broken
Trigger.RegularExpression: The condition of your .* is now 0%

Trigger.Name: Food Wore
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1E:[0-9A-F]{8}:(?<char>.*) loses the effect of Well Fed

Trigger.Name: Inactive Warning
Trigger.RegularExpression: (?<minutes>[0-9]) minutes have elapsed since your last activity\. If you are inactive for 10 minutes, you will be expelled from the duty\.
